verbs.description: six - figure settlement for schenectady police brutality case the city [V: is] reportedly discussing a payout of between 300 000 and 400 000 to settle a lawsuit filed last year by a woman who alleges she was brutalized by two schenectady cops according to several people familiar with the ongoing negotiations plaintiff nicola cottone claims in the federal suit that then lt mark mccracken who formerly served as the city police department spokesman and officer andrew macdonald slammed her head onto a bench at the police station in a september 2016 incident attorney u s district court executive carl falotico police brutality andrew macdonald producer kevin luibrand lt mark mccracken eric clifford andrew macdonald city police department nicola cottone schenectady city council police times union mark mccracken officer schenectady new york
